title: (x) Virgin Trains - Hotline Magazine headline face - Generation Gothic {Yves}
content:
Hi everyone,

I hope someone can help me in indentifying the font used in the attachement.

Thanks in advance,

Seb

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [darkstar.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014051323/http:/typophile.com/files/darkstar.jpg) | 15.28 KB |

 [‹ Angèle - Decorative](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014051323/http:/typophile.com/node/12798 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) School script like font - MeMimas {Karen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014051323/http:/typophile.com/node/12793 "Go to next forum topic")
author: all about seb

comments.content: ABC Types’ [Generation Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014051323/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/abctypes/generation-gothic/extra-bold/testdrive.html?s=DARK+STAR&p=72), designed by [Tony Mayers](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014051323/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tony%252BMayers), and featured quite heavily in Computer Arts magazine.
Thank to yves, for id’ing the font...
